nodes.text: Star Wars Topps Classic Sticker Book

Star Wars Topps Classic Sticker Book is a paperback title published by Abrams Books for Young Readers on April 4, 2017. The book includes more than 250 vintage stickers, many recreated from Topps' classic Star Wars original trilogy collectible sticker series from 1977 to 1983. Also included are bonus vintage-style stickers from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
